title: Dell released so MANY gaming monitors!!! - S-Series
description: Thanks to Morning Brew for sponsoring today's video! Sign up to Morning Brew for free today at   Dell released their 2021 line-up of S-series gaming monitors, it's a bit weird since they do own Alienware and typically release it under that name. Oh well!   Check out Dell's 2021 line of gaming monitors below! Dell S2522HG -  Dell S2722DGM -  Dell S3222DGM -  Dell S3422DWG -   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
